name: Font Awesome Icons - Regular, Solid, Brands
description:
3776 Icon Components

Icons organized by category as on the Font Awesome Website.


3 Text Styles

  • Font Awesome / Regular
  • Font Awesome / Solid
  • Font Awesome / Brands


Instructions

  1. Download "Free for Desktop" fonts on Font Awesome
  2. Install the .OTF files inside the download from above
  3. Clone and Publish this file as a Library in Figma
  4. Use the included Text Styles to switch icon style within the same icon component
